dn9:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
dn9:1.3_0: Tena kho pana samayena poṭṭhapādo paribbājako samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasati
dn9:1.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya sāvatthiṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
dn9:2.3_0: Yannūnāhaṁ yena samayappavādako tindukācīro ekasālako mallikāya ārāmo,
dn9:2.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā yena samayappavādako tindukācīro ekasālako mallikāya ārāmo tenupasaṅkami.
dn9:3.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena poṭṭhapādo paribbājako mahatiyā paribbājakaparisāya saddhiṁ nisinno hoti unnādiniyā
dn9:3.2_0: Seyyathidaṁ—rājakathaṁ corakathaṁ mahāmattakathaṁ senākathaṁ bhayakathaṁ yuddhakathaṁ annakathaṁ pānakathaṁ
dn9:3.2_1: vatthakathaṁ sayanakathaṁ mālākathaṁ gandhakathaṁ ñātikathaṁ yānakathaṁ gāmakathaṁ nigamakathaṁ nagarakathaṁ
dn9:3.2_2: janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ sūrakathaṁ visikhākathaṁ kumbhaṭṭhānakathaṁ pubbapetakathaṁ nānattakathaṁ
dn9:4.1_0: Addasā kho poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ;
dn9:4.5_0: Appasaddakāmo kho so āyasmā appasaddassa vaṇṇavādī.
dn9:4.6_0: Appeva nāma appasaddaṁ parisaṁ viditvā upasaṅkamitabbaṁ maññeyyā”ti.
dn9:4.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, te paribbājakā tuṇhī ahesuṁ.
dn9:5.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā yena poṭṭhapādo paribbājako tenupasaṅkami.
dn9:5.2_0: Atha kho poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
dn9:5.5_0: Cirassaṁ kho, bhante, bhagavā imaṁ pariyāyamakāsi, yadidaṁ idhāgamanāya.
dn9:5.6_0: Nisīdatu, bhante, bhagavā, idaṁ āsanaṁ paññattan”ti.
dn9:5.8_0: Poṭṭhapādopi kho paribbājako aññataraṁ nīcaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
dn9:5.9_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho poṭṭhapādaṁ paribbājakaṁ bhagavā etadavoca:
dn9:5.10_0: “kāya nuttha, poṭṭhapāda, etarahi kathāya sannisinnā, kā ca pana vo antarākathā vippakatā”ti?
dn9:6.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
dn9:6.2_0: “tiṭṭhatesā, bhante, kathā, yāya mayaṁ etarahi kathāya sannisinnā.
dn9:6.3_0: Nesā, bhante, kathā bhagavato dullabhā bhavissati pacchāpi savanāya.
dn9:6.4_2: nānātitthiyānaṁ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṁ kotūhalasālāya sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ abhisaññānirodhe kathā udapādi:
dn9:6.8_0: Yasmiṁ samaye uppajjanti, saññī tasmiṁ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.9_0: Yasmiṁ samaye nirujjhanti, asaññī tasmiṁ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.12_0: ‘na kho pana metaṁ, bho, evaṁ bhavissati.
dn9:6.15_0: Yasmiṁ samaye upeti, saññī tasmiṁ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.16_0: Yasmiṁ samaye apeti, asaññī tasmiṁ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.19_0: ‘na kho pana metaṁ, bho, evaṁ bhavissati.
dn9:6.20_0: Santi hi, bho, samaṇabrāhmaṇā mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā.
dn9:6.21_0: Te imassa purisassa saññaṁ upakaḍḍhantipi apakaḍḍhantipi.
dn9:6.22_0: Yasmiṁ samaye upakaḍḍhanti, saññī tasmiṁ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.23_0: Yasmiṁ samaye apakaḍḍhanti, asaññī tasmiṁ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.26_0: ‘na kho pana metaṁ, bho, evaṁ bhavissati.
dn9:6.27_0: Santi hi, bho, devatā mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā.
dn9:6.28_0: Tā imassa purisassa saññaṁ upakaḍḍhantipi apakaḍḍhantipi.
dn9:6.29_0: Yasmiṁ samaye upakaḍḍhanti, saññī tasmiṁ samaye hoti.
dn9:6.30_0: Yasmiṁ samaye apakaḍḍhanti, asaññī tasmiṁ samaye hotī’ti.
dn9:6.32_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁyeva ārabbha sati udapādi:
dn9:6.33_0: ‘aho nūna bhagavā, aho nūna sugato, yo imesaṁ dhammānaṁ sukusalo’ti.
dn9:6.34_0: Bhagavā, bhante, kusalo, bhagavā pakataññū abhisaññānirodhassa.
dn9:6.35_0: Kathaṁ nu kho, bhante, abhisaññānirodho hotī”ti?
dn9:7.2_0: ‘ahetū appaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī’ti, āditova tesaṁ aparaddhaṁ.
dn9:7.4_0: Sahetū hi, poṭṭhapāda, sappaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipi.
dn9:7.5_0: Sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:7.7_0: “Idha, poṭṭhapāda, tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṁ, sammāsambuddho …pe…
dn9:7.8_0: Evaṁ kho, poṭṭhapāda, bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti …pe…
dn9:8.1_0: tassime pañcanīvaraṇe pahīne attani samanupassato pāmojjaṁ jāyati,
dn9:9-10.1_2: savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.

dn9:11.2_0: Tassa yā purimā vivekajapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:11.4_0: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:12.1_2: bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno,
dn9:12.2_0: Tassa yā purimā samādhijapītisukhasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:12.4_0: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.
dn9:13.1_2: bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ
dn9:13.2_0: Tassa yā purimā upekkhāsukhasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:13.4_0: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.

dn9:14.2_0: Tassa yā purimā rūpasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:14.4_0: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.

dn9:15.2_0: Tassa yā purimā ākāsānañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.
dn9:15.4_0: Evampi sikkhā ekā saññā uppajjati, sikkhā ekā saññā nirujjhati.

dn9:16.2_0: Tassa yā purimā viññāṇañcāyatanasukhumasaccasaññā, sā nirujjhati.

dn9:17.1_3: so tato amutra tato amutra anupubbena saññaggaṁ phusati.

dn9:19.1_0: “Ekaññeva nu kho, bhante, bhagavā saññaggaṁ paññapeti, udāhu puthūpi saññagge paññapetī”ti?
dn9:19.2_0: “Ekampi kho ahaṁ, poṭṭhapāda, saññaggaṁ paññapemi, puthūpi saññagge paññapemī”ti.
dn9:19.3_0: “Yathā kathaṁ pana, bhante, bhagavā ekampi saññaggaṁ paññapeti, puthūpi saññagge paññapetī”ti?
dn9:19.4_0: “Yathā yathā kho, poṭṭhapāda, nirodhaṁ phusati tathā tathāhaṁ saññaggaṁ paññapemi.
dn9:19.5_0: Evaṁ kho ahaṁ, poṭṭhapāda, ekampi saññaggaṁ paññapemi, puthūpi saññagge paññapemī”ti.
dn9:20.1_5: udāhu saññā ca ñāṇañca apubbaṁ acarimaṁ uppajjantī”ti?
dn9:20.2_0: “Saññā kho, poṭṭhapāda, paṭhamaṁ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇaṁ, saññuppādā ca pana ñāṇuppādo hoti.
dn9:20.5_0: Iminā kho etaṁ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ—
dn9:20.6_0: yathā saññā paṭhamaṁ uppajjati, pacchā ñāṇaṁ, saññuppādā ca pana ñāṇuppādo hotī”ti.
dn9:21.1_0: “Saññā nu kho, bhante, purisassa attā, udāhu aññā saññā añño attā”ti?
dn9:21.3_0: “Oḷārikaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, attānaṁ paccemi rūpiṁ cātumahābhūtikaṁ kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhan”ti.

dn9:21.7_0: Iminā kho etaṁ, poṭṭhapāda, pariyāyena veditabbaṁ yathā aññāva saññā bhavissati añño attā”ti.

dn9:25.2_0: ‘saññā purisassa attā’ti vā, ‘aññāva saññā añño attā’ti vā;
dn9:25.3_0: kiṁ pana, bhante, ‘sassato loko, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’”ti?
dn9:26.1_0: “Kiṁ pana, bhante, ‘asassato loko, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’”ti?

dn9:27.10_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan’”ti.
dn9:28.2_3: na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattati,

dn9:31.1_0: Atha kho te paribbājakā acirapakkantassa bhagavato poṭṭhapādaṁ paribbājakaṁ samantato vācā sannitodakena sañjhabbharimakaṁsu:
dn9:31.2_0: “evameva panāyaṁ bhavaṁ poṭṭhapādo yaññadeva samaṇo gotamo bhāsati, taṁ tadevassa abbhanumodati:
dn9:31.4_0: Na kho pana mayaṁ kiñci samaṇassa gotamassa ekaṁsikaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāma:
dn9:31.5_8: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā,
dn9:31.5_9: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā”ti.
dn9:31.6_0: Evaṁ vutte, poṭṭhapādo paribbājako te paribbājake etadavoca:
dn9:31.7_0: “ahampi kho, bho, na kiñci samaṇassa gotamassa ekaṁsikaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāmi:
dn9:31.9_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti vā;
dn9:31.10_0: api ca samaṇo gotamo bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ tathaṁ paṭipadaṁ paññapeti dhammaṭṭhitataṁ dhammaniyāmataṁ.
dn9:31.11_0: Bhūtaṁ kho pana tacchaṁ tathaṁ paṭipadaṁ paññapentassa dhammaṭṭhitataṁ dhammaniyāmataṁ,
dn9:31.11_1: kathañhi nāma mādiso viññū samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodeyyā”ti?
dn9:32.1_0: Atha kho dvīhatīhassa accayena citto ca hatthisāriputto poṭṭhapādo ca paribbājako yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
dn9:32.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā citto hatthisāriputto bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
dn9:32.2_0: Poṭṭhapādo pana paribbājako bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
dn9:32.2_1: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
dn9:32.3_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho poṭṭhapādo paribbājako bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

dn9:32.7_0: Na kho pana mayaṁ kiñci samaṇassa gotamassa ekaṁsikaṁ dhammaṁ desitaṁ ājānāma:
dn9:32.8_8: “hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti vā,
dn9:32.8_9: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti vā’ti.
dn9:32.9_0: Evaṁ vuttāhaṁ, bhante, te paribbājake etadavocaṁ:

dn9:32.12_0: “neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā”ti vā;
dn9:32.13_0: api ca samaṇo gotamo bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ tathaṁ paṭipadaṁ paññapeti dhammaṭṭhitataṁ dhammaniyāmataṁ.
dn9:32.14_0: Bhūtaṁ kho pana tacchaṁ tathaṁ paṭipadaṁ paññapentassa dhammaṭṭhitataṁ dhammaniyāmataṁ,
dn9:32.14_1: kathañhi nāma mādiso viññū samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodeyyā’”ti?
dn9:33.1_0: “Sabbeva kho ete, poṭṭhapāda, paribbājakā andhā acakkhukā;
dn9:33.3_0: Ekaṁsikāpi hi kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā dhammā desitā paññattā;
dn9:33.4_0: anekaṁsikāpi hi kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā dhammā desitā paññattā.
dn9:33.5_0: Katame ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṁsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
dn9:33.6_0: ‘Sassato loko’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṁsiko dhammo desito paññatto;
dn9:33.7_0: ‘asassato loko’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṁsiko dhammo desito paññatto;
dn9:33.13_0: na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda …
dn9:33.14_0: ‘hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti kho, poṭṭhapāda …
dn9:33.15_0: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti kho,
dn9:33.16_0: Kasmā ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā anekaṁsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
dn9:33.17_2: atthasaṁhitā na dhammasaṁhitā na ādibrahmacariyakā na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya
dn9:33.17_3: na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṁvattanti.
dn9:33.18_0: Tasmā te mayā anekaṁsikā dhammā desitā paññattā.
dn9:33.20_0: Katame ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṁsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
dn9:33.21_0: Idaṁ dukkhanti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṁsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.22_0: Ayaṁ dukkhasamudayoti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṁsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.23_0: Ayaṁ dukkhanirodhoti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṁsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.24_0: Ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti kho, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṁsiko dhammo desito paññatto.
dn9:33.25_0: Kasmā ca te, poṭṭhapāda, mayā ekaṁsikā dhammā desitā paññattā?
